mapper.insert: insert into efence_job (id, job_code, efence_code, name, status, create_time, remark, device_codes) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{efenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceCodes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update efence_job set job_code = #{jobCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, efence_code = #{efenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_codes = #{deviceCodes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, job_code, efence_code, name, status, create_time, remark, device_codes from efence_job
